content:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/trialplanner/schema.py
DIR_STATE:["src/trialplanner/__init__.py", "src/trialplanner/schema.py"]
SUMMARY: Added compact Pydantic schemas for arms, ZPD supports (type/timing/fading), measurement schedules, and causal-chain tests for transfer and durability within multi-wave randomized trials.
